    Texting

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class built from Free Software (GPLv3 or later) by cannibalizing parts of Voice.java of the free software package, Google-Voice-Java:
    See Also:
    http://code.google.com/p/google-voice-java/

      • getGeneral

        public java.lang.String getGeneral()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches the page Source Code for the Voice homepage. This file contains most of the useful information for the Google Voice Account such as attached PhoneOld info and Contacts.
        Returns:
        the general
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • setRNRSEE

        private void setRNRSEE()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Internal method which parses the Homepage source code to determine the rnrsee variable, this variable is passed into most functions for placing calls and sms.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
